questions.question: Wabonye gute muri rusangi iyi reresi?
answers: Nayikunze kandi yari ngira kamaro
Ntaho mpagaze kandi nibaza ko vyoba vyari ngira kamaro canke atari ngira kamaro
Sinahimbawe n'iyi reresi kandi nibaza ko itari ngira kamaro

questions.question: Ni ubuhe bushobozi buri muri ino reresi?
answers: Gukorera mu runani rwiza
Ntudohoke
kugenzura inyiyumvo zawe

questions.question: Ni iyihe ntumbero y'agakorwa?
answers: Gufasha abanyeshure gutegura amahangiro n'integuro zishikwako
Gufasha abanyeshure kumenya ibitera amatati
Gufasha abanyeshure gutahura ko ibikorwa vyabo bishobora guhindura uko abandi biyumva no kugenzura ibishika vyabo

questions.question: Ninde ari umunyatugenege kandi ni nde ari igishusho muri aka akorwa?
answers: Umunyeshure ni igishusho umunyeshure nawe ni umunyatugenegene
Mu mugwi wa 2: umunyeshure umwe ni umunyatugenegene uwundi nawe ni igishusho
Umwigisha ni igishusho abanyeshure nabo ni abanyatugenegene

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegerezwa kubwira abanyeshure ukugene boshobora gutwengesha bagenzi babo
Notegerezwa gukora ibishoka kugira ngo abanyeshure bose baronke amahirwe yokuba igishusho n'umunyatugenegene
Notegerezwa guhagarika kwimenyereza agakorwa mu gihe abanyeshure badashoboye gutwengeshanya

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?(
answers: Notegerezwa kureka abanyeshure bagakoranako mu gutwengeshanya
Notegerezwa kureka abanyeshure gukora ivyo biyumvamwo gukora vyose
Notegerezwa guca intege abana badashoboye kugenzura agatwengo kabo

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu utotegerezwa gurakora?(
answers: Sinotegerezwa kureka abanyeshure bakoraneko mu kwimenyereza kano gakorwa
Sinotegerezwa gushira abanyeshure mu mirwi ya babiri-babiri
Sinotegerezwa kwitaho imirwi y'abanyeshure babiri-babiri vyadidaniwe

questions.question: Ni akahe karorero k'ikibazo wobaza abanyeshure bawe mu gihe co kurongora ikiganiro muri aka gakorwa?
answers: Kubera iki ari ngira kamaro gushora kumenya uko wokwiyumva bitaragushikira?
Ni gute ayo matati yotegerejwe kuba yaririnzwe?
Wibaza ko ibikorwa vyawe bikora ku nyiyumvo za bagenzawe gute buri musi?

questions.question: Wokora iki mu gihe abanyeshure bawe babaye ibishusho batwenga ningoga na ningoga?
answers: Notegerezwa kurondera igikorwa gishasha co gukora
Notegerezwa kubandanya nimenyereza agakorwa buri musi mu gufasha abanyeshure kwimenyereza kugenzura ibishika vyabo
Notegerezwa guha indero abanyeshure batwenga ningoga
